techs.name: Divine Intervention
techs.quote: 'The gods watch over their faithful servants' - Oracle of Delphi

civilopediaText.text: Divine Intervention represents the blessing of the gods upon their worshippers, granting divine favor and protection.

techs.name: Sacred Architecture
techs.quote: 'Build temples to honor the gods, and they shall grant you their favor' - High Priest

civilopediaText.text: Sacred Architecture allows civilizations to construct magnificent temples and religious structures to honor their pantheon.

techs.name: Mythological Warfare
techs.quote: 'Call upon the mythical beasts, and watch your enemies tremble' - War Priest

civilopediaText.text: Mythological Warfare represents the ability to summon and command legendary creatures in battle, harnessing their supernatural power.

techs.name: Titan Technology
techs.quote: 'The power of the Titans flows through our civilization' - Archon

civilopediaText.text: Titan Technology represents the pinnacle of mythological knowledge, combining ancient wisdom with the raw power of the Titans themselves.
